headline: Pomerantz Law Firm Reminds Investors with Losses on their Investment in Skyworks Solutions, Inc. of Class Action Lawsuit and Upcoming Deadlines - SWKS
summary: NEW YORK, April 14, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Pomerantz LLP announces that a class action lawsuit has been filed against Skyworks Solutions, Inc.  . Such investors are advised to contact Danielle Peyton...

headline: 'Nobody Is Getting Off The Hook,' But iPhones Are: Reiterating Buy On Apple
summary: Apple Inc.'s exemption from U.S.-China tariffs is crucial for its growth, and it remains a strong long-term pick amidst trade tensions. Read more about AAPL stock here.
